part.period: saw some fine bunches of grapes
hanging from a vine that was trained along a high trellis,
and did his best to reach them by jumping as high as he could into the air.
But it was all in vain, for they were out to reach:
so he gave up trying and walked away with an air of dignity and unconcern, remarking:
"I thought those grapes were ripe, but I see now they're quite sour".
